name: hedonistically
content:

in a way that is hedonistic (= living and behaving so that you have as much pleasure as possible, according to the belief that the most important thing in life is to enjoy yourself): Back in their younger days, they tended to live more hedonistically, seeking good food, good drink, wild parties, and thrills. They serve a hedonistically rich chocolate cake at this restaurant. Related word
hedonistic
More examplesFewer examplesHe spends his days hedonistically seeking any thrill or euphoria, no matter how fleeting. The table was laid out with rich cheeses and fine wine, a smorgasbord for the hedonistically minded.
